Precision Plastic Injection Molding Process

Mouldteck , in partnership with Plastiversum AG (Swiss), leads the injection molding industry by utilizing advanced Swiss technology to process a diverse range of materials, while also offering additional post-molding services.

* Innovative Service Offerings and
Effective Solutions

Utilizing Cutting-Edge Software and Integrating the Latest Technologies for Comprehensive Product Design, Detailing, and Manufacturing Assembly Prototypes.

Industrial Design.

Stand out from the crowd with custom product designs tailored exclusively for you, ensuring a unique and distinctive presence.

Mold Tooling.

In our comprehensive tool room setup, we handle the entire lifecycle of injection mold tools—from design and fabrication to rigorous testing..

Production.

Our facility is equipped with state-of-the-art plastic injection molding machines, enabling us to fulfill any volume requirement with precision and efficiency.

* About Us

Moulteck, founded in 2020, aspires to be a front-runner in Watch-making Precision Injection Mold and Plastic Parts, leveraging cutting-edge technologies in alignment with Global Standards.

Moulteck is an ISO 9001:2023 certified manufacturer specializing in the 'Design and Manufacturing of Injection Molds and Plastic Products.' True to its name, Moulteck radiates brilliance in providing unparalleled quality services, dedicated to fostering trust among our delighted customers worldwide.

* Why Choose Us *

Selecting us as your mold designer guarantees expertise, precision, and innovation. Our team's extensive experience ensures high-quality designs, and our commitment to staying at the forefront of industry trends guarantees cutting-edge solutions tailored to your unique requirements.
